Headline: #71/71st South Shore, #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Commercial/87th
ShortDescription: Revision: NB 71/71st South Shore, 26 South Shore Express buses are temp. rerouted via Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd, & South Shore Dr., due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revision: Northbound #71/71st South Shore and #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd, and South Shore Dr., due to street blockage near Commercial/87th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Armitage
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Armitage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer on a train at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
